properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 5:49PM EST until January 13 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Cleveland OH
properties.description:
...The flood warning is cancelled for the following rivers in Ohio...

Sandusky River Above Fremont

...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio...

Huron River Near Milan
Blanchard River Near Findlay
Eagle Creek Above Findlay
Portage River At Woodville
Sandusky River At Tiffin
Maumee River Near Grand Rapids
Maumee River At Waterville
Scioto River Near Larue
Scioto River Near Prospect
Killbuck Creek Near Killbuck

The flood warning continues for
The Killbuck Creek Near Killbuck.
* From Sunday evening until late Sunday night.
* At  5:00 PM Saturday the stage was...12.6 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 15.0 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by Sunday evening and rise to
near 15.0 feet by Sunday evening. The river will fall below flood
stage by Sunday evening.
* At 16.0 feet...Flooded roads in and near Killbuck include Water
Street, County Road 621, State Route 60 south, State Route 520, as
well as local low lying roads. Holmes county fairgrounds inundated.
properties.instruction:
Never drive your car through flooded roadways. The water may be
deeper than it appears. Turn around...don't drown!

Stay tuned to NOAA weather radio and other local media for further
details and updates.
